thread.title: Parents want to raise awareness of eczema cream dangers | Anglia
thread.title_full: Parents want to raise awareness of eczema cream dangers | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Parents want to raise awareness of eczema cream dangers | Anglia
text:
Charlie Maddy A five-year-old boy from Northamptonshire was left covered in sores after his father claims he became addicted to the steroids in his eczema cream.
At it's worst Charlie Maddy had to be sedated in hospital and given morphine for the pain.
He is now recovering and his parents are trying to raise awareness.
Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 Northamptonshire
